age.error: Maximum age should be greater than minimum age

lergo.description: LerGO is a new non-profit EdTech venture aimed at providing free, animated & interactive online lessons for all children, anywhere, at any time. This will be made possible through LerGO's open source cloud platform, which will leverage the goodwill of the community, enabling contributors to easily create animated & interactive lessons. Kids will use these lessons as a free alternative to private tutoring/lessons, to self-learn all school subjects, enjoyably and at their own pace.
lergo.title: LerGO - Educate Yourself
